bibl.title: Four Obols a Day Men at Saqqara.
Le monde grec. Hommages à Claire Préaux
bibl.author: Turner, Eric G.

bibl.note: Accounts. 4th or very early 3rd century B.C. Will be republished in the collected catalogue of the papyrus finds from the site.
Turner Eric G., Four Obols a Day Men at Saqqara.
Le monde grec. Hommages à Claire Préaux (Bruxelles, 1975) pp. 573-577 et pl. X.
